column2: Looking for an enthusiastic Electronics Maker who is passionate about technology and loves to build and contribute to Online Electronics Community     He/She should have relevant design experience of minimum 1 year in any electronics domain and should have excellent communication skills (Written and Verbal)           Key Responsibility          Job Responsibilities :         Design and Develop Hardware, Firmware and Prototypes related to IoT, Power Electronics, Embedded, etc     Organize, Plan and Build Content for our Electronics Community websites including but not limited to Semiconmedia.com     Design and Build Interesting Projects that you are passionate about, as a full-time job     Present and showcase your work on Indias one of the largest electronics online community - Semiconmedia.com     Interacting with high profile people to discuss the latest technology and industry trends     Opportunity to work with different development platforms, boards, and sensors that are popular in the industry     Effective team player with lead responsibilities         Requirements      Qualification     :         Excellent English Communication Skills (Written/Verbal)     Should have a good experience working with basic development platforms like Arduino, ESP, Raspberry Pi, etc     Experience with basic electronics Circuit Design, Simulation, and PCB Design     Willingness to research, learn, build and share new technology     Reputable online presence on platforms like Github, Instructables, Hackster etc is an added advantage

column2: Key Responsibilities: - Perform regular preventive maintenance on plastic moulds to ensure optimal performance. Identify and troubleshoot issues with moulds, including wear and tear, damage, or malfunctions. Coordinate with production teams to schedule maintenance activities without disrupting production schedules. Keep detailed records of maintenance activities, including dates, procedures, and outcomes. Supervise and manage the tool room operations, ensuring all tools and equipment are properly maintained. Oversee the inventory of spare parts, tools, and equipment required for mould maintenance. Collaborate with procurement to ensure the availability of necessary spare parts and tools. Lead a team of toolmakers and technicians, providing guidance, training, and support. Foster a culture of safety, quality, and continuous improvement within the team. Diagnose and rectify any issues with existing moulds to minimize downtime. Collaborate with production and quality control teams to address and resolve mould-related issues affecting product quality. Identify opportunities for process improvements in mould maintenance and implement best practices. Stay updated on the latest technologies and advancements in plastic injection moulding to enhance tool room efficiency. Qualifications and Skills: Degree / Diploma or equivalent in Mechanical Engineering or related field. Proven experience in plastic mould maintenance and tool room management. In-depth knowledge of plastic injection moulding processes. Strong leadership and team management skills. Excellent problem-solving and troubleshooting abilities. Effective communication skills for coordination with cross-functional teams.
column11: TOOL ROOM, Plastic Injection Molding, Mould Maintenance, Cipet, troubleshooting abilities
